definition: characterized by unusual lightness and delicacy, filaments from a web that was spun by a spider
details:
adjective
- characterized by unusual lightness and delicacy
= synonyms: ethereal
- so thin as to transmit light
= synonyms: sheer
noun
- filaments from a web that was spun by a spider
= synonyms: cobweb
- a gauze fabric with an extremely fine texture
